statements: SELECT * FROM StudentPerformance;
SELECT student_id, performance_score FROM StudentPerformance WHERE performance_score > 80;
SELECT course_id, AVG(effectiveness_rating) as avg_rating FROM CourseEffectiveness GROUP BY course_id;
SELECT * FROM CourseEffectiveness WHERE effectiveness_rating < 3.5 ORDER BY course_id DESC;
SELECT teacher_id, course_id, effectiveness_rating FROM CourseEffectiveness WHERE teacher_id = 1001 ORDER BY effectiveness_rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM StudentPerformance WHERE performance_score > 80;
SELECT student_id, performance_score FROM StudentPerformance WHERE course_id = 1 ORDER BY performance_score DESC;
SELECT student_id, course_id, performance_score FROM StudentPerformance INNER JOIN CourseEffectiveness ON StudentPerformance.course_id = CourseEffectiveness.course_id;
SELECT teacher_id, AVG(effectiveness_rating) AS avg_effectiveness FROM CourseEffectiveness GROUP BY teacher_id HAVING AVG(effectiveness_rating) > 4;
SELECT DISTINCT course_id, teacher_id FROM CourseEffectiveness ORDER BY course_id, teacher_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT student_id, student_name FROM Students WHERE grade = 'A';
SELECT student_name, grade FROM Students WHERE course_id = 101;
SELECT course_name, teacher_id FROM Courses WHERE number_of_students > 30;
SELECT course_id, course_name, teacher_id, number_of_students FROM Courses;
SELECT student_id, student_name, grade FROM Students WHERE course_id = 101 ORDER BY student_name DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM Students WHERE grade = 'A' AND student_name LIKE 'M%' ORDER BY student_id ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT course_id, course_name, teacher_id, number_of_students FROM Courses WHERE number_of_students > 20 ORDER BY course_name LIMIT 5

SELECT student_id, student_name, grade, Courses.course_name FROM Students INNER JOIN Courses ON Students.course_id = Courses.course_id WHERE Students.grade <> 'F' ORDER BY Courses.course_name, student_id DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT student_id, student_name, grade FROM Students WHERE course_id IN (101, 102, 103) AND grade IS NOT NULL ORDER BY student_id, grade DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_id, student_name FROM students ORDER BY student_name ASC;
SELECT course_id, course_name, course_description FROM courses WHERE course_id = 1;
SELECT student_id, course_id, enrollment_date FROM student_course_enrollment WHERE student_id = 5 AND course_id = 3;
SELECT student_id, COUNT(enrollment_id) AS num_courses_enrolled FROM student_course_enrollment GROUP BY student_id;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE student_id = 1
SELECT student_name, enrollment_date FROM students WHERE student_id = 5
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM courses WHERE course_id = 3
SELECT student_name, course_name, grade FROM students INNER JOIN student_course_enrollment ON students.student_id = student_course_enrollment.student_id WHERE student_course_enrollment.grade > 90

SELECT student_name, course_name, enrollment_date FROM students INNER JOIN student_course_enrollment ON students.student_id = student_course_enrollment.student_id INNER JOIN courses ON student_course_enrollment.course_id = courses.course_id WHERE student_course_enrollment.grade < 70
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_name, class_id FROM Students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT course_name, course_code FROM Courses ORDER BY course_id DESC;
SELECT teacher_name, department_id FROM Teachers WHERE teacher_id = 3;
SELECT student_id, course_id, grade_value FROM Grades WHERE grade_value >= 90;
SELECT student_name, class_id FROM Students;
SELECT teacher_name, department_id FROM Teachers WHERE teacher_id = 1;
SELECT course_name, course_code FROM Courses ORDER BY course_name DESC;
SELECT report_date, report_type FROM Reports WHERE student_id = 2 AND teacher_id = 1;
SELECT student_id, MAX(grade_value) AS max_grade FROM Grades GROUP BY student_id;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, student_grade, student_id FROM students ORDER BY student_grade DESC;
SELECT course_id, course_name FROM courses WHERE course_id BETWEEN 101 AND 105;
SELECT teacher_name, teacher_subject FROM teachers WHERE teacher_subject = 'Math';
SELECT s.student_name, c.course_name, sp.grade FROM students s JOIN student_performance sp ON s.student_id = sp.student_id JOIN courses c ON sp.course_id = c.course_id ORDER BY sp.grade DESC;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE student_grade > 80;
SELECT student_name, student_grade FROM students ORDER BY student_grade DESC;
SELECT * FROM teachers WHERE teacher_subject = 'Mathematics';

SELECT student_name, course_name, grade FROM students JOIN student_performance ON students.student_id = student_performance.student_id JOIN courses ON student_performance.course_id = courses.course_id;

SELECT teacher_name, course_name, effectiveness_rating FROM teachers JOIN course_effectiveness ON teachers.teacher_id = course_effectiveness.teacher_id JOIN courses ON course_effectiveness.course_id = courses.course_id WHERE effectiveness_rating > 4.5;
